attributes.action: implement effective change to the current 'one size fits all' approach to primary and secondary education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To re-introduce streaming for children in schools to enable them to work at their own level rather than at a standard pre-determined by financial considerations. This will better enable students who fall outside of these parameters to flourish and improve the standard of learning for many students.
